import React,{useState}from'react';const Chatbot=()=>{const[messages,setMessages]=useState([{text:"Hello! How can I help you today?",sender:"bot"}]);const[input,setInput]=useState('');const sendMessage=text=>{const newMessage={text,sender:'user'};setMessages([...messages,newMessage]);// Simulate bot response
setTimeout(()=>{const botMessage={text:"This is a simulated response.",sender:'bot'};setMessages(prevMessages=>[...prevMessages,botMessage]);},1000);};const handleSubmit=event=>{event.preventDefault();if(input.trim()){sendMessage(input);setInput('');}};return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",{className:"chatbot"},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",{className:"chatbot-messages"},messages.map((msg,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",{key:index,className:"chatbot-message chatbot-message-".concat(msg.sender)},msg.text))),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,className:"chatbot-input-form"},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("input",{type:"text",value:input,onChange:e=>setInput(e.target.value),className:"chatbot-input",placeholder:"Type a message..."}),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("button",{type:"submit",className:"chatbot-send-button"},"Send")));};export default Chatbot;
